original_title: Hackaday Podcast Episode 267: Metal Casting, Plasma Cutting, and a Spicy 555
original_content:
What were some of the best posts on Hackaday last week? Elliot Williams and Al Williams decided there were too many to choose from, but they did take a sampling of the ones that caught their attention. This weeks picks were an eclectic mix of everything from metal casting and plasma cutters to radio astronomy and space telescope budgets. In between? Some basic circuit design, 3D printing, games, dogs, and software tools. Sound confusing? It wont be, after you listen to this weeks podcast.
Check out the links below if you want to follow along, and as always, tell us what you think about this episode in the comments!
